definition: to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
ten (used in fractions, writing checks etc)/assorted/miscellaneous

sentences.english: Even today Nash sometimes hears the old voices.
sentences.chinese: 今天納什還能常聽到那些從前的幻音。

sentences.english: Nash has won the most valuable player honors in NBA All-Star GAME.
sentences.chinese: 納什獲得了NBA全明星隊最有價值球員的榮譽稱號。

sentences.english: But the stylistic idol of this era of point guards will most certainly be Nash.
sentences.chinese: 但是，在這個時代，最有風格的偶像非納什莫屬。

sentences.english: In addition, in the off-season period Nash also lived in Manhattan.
sentences.chinese: 此外，在休賽期納什也住在曼哈頓。

sentences.english: I pointed out that the book was in good condition and Nash was a fun poet.
sentences.chinese: 我指出這本書保存狀況頗好，納什是個有趣的詩人。

sentences.english: I am available for gigs in my home of Nashville, TN.
sentences.chinese: 我在我的納什維爾，TN家庭音樂會可用。

sentences.english: That is one of the reasons that some years ago I moved to Nashville , TN.
sentences.chinese: 這也是我在幾年前搬到納什維爾的原因之一。

sentences.english: She also regularly patronized Nashville's Bluebird Cafe and similar clubs, studying the performances and immersing herself in the world of singer? songwriters.
sentences.chinese: 她還時常光顧納什維爾的藍鳥咖啡屋和類似的俱樂部。

sentences.english: Steve Nash's legacy needs no padding, obviously.
sentences.chinese: 顯然，史蒂夫納什留給我們的不需要多說。

sentences.english: He was playing Go, an ancient Asian game.
sentences.chinese: 納什正在下圍棋，圍棋是源自亞洲的古老遊戲。

sentences.english: Nashville is a port of entry and major commercial center known especially for its music industry. Population, 488,374.
sentences.chinese: 納什維爾是一個進口港和主要的商業中心。

sentences.english: Get the Nash Equilibrium of mixed strategy.
sentences.chinese: 得出其博弈的混合策略的納什均衡解。

sentences.english: One of these schools is Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee.
sentences.chinese: 這些學校之一，是貝爾蒙在田納西州納什維爾大學。

sentences.english: I was lucky enough to get to know Clayton once he moved to Nashville.
sentences.chinese: 當初克萊頓剛搬到納什維爾我就知道了。
